thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-FNF Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.88 From Continuing Operations

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-FNF Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.88 From Continuing Operations
text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Fidelity National Financial Inc:
* FNF REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER 2017 DILUTED EPS FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS OF $0.88 AND ADJUSTED DILUTED EPS FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS OF $0.60, PRE-TAX TITLE MARGIN OF 13.4% AND ADJUSTED PRE-TAX TITLE MARGIN OF 14.7%
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.60 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.88 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q4 REVENUE $2.0 BILLION VERSUS $1.9 BILLION * BOARD DECIDED TO INCREASE QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND, WITH Q4 2017 DIVIDEND INCREASING TO $0.27 PER SHARE
* FIDELITY NATIONAL FINANCIAL - IN QUARTER, A $93 MILLION CREDIT ADJUSTMENT RECORDED TO REVALUE NET DEFERRED TAX LIABILITY POSITION WITH RECENT TAX REGULATION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
